name: Fatty In Trouble
summary:
Fatty tries to fly with help of wings. He accidentally comes to food land. So now, Fatty is in food land.
Food land has junk food as well as healthy food. Fatty is already so fatty that he can’t tolerate more junk food as they may put him in trouble. Fatty should eat only healthy food to be safe and avoid trouble.
Your purpose is to avoid fatty colliding with junk food and eat only healthy food which come as he fly forward.
Help fatty in his food adventure and try to cover distance as much as possible and try to come safe out of the food land.
